page.title: 16Religious attitudes.
page.content: There are 21 chapels and churches in our area. They consist of the following denominations:- Baptists, Church in Wales, Roman Catholic, Apostolic Church, Presbyterian, Spiritualist Church, Methodist, Salvation Army and Congregational. Some chapels are used for other things. One is used as a theatre, another is used as a Christian Conference Centre and another has been turned into a carpet warehouse. From the results of a survey undertaken in the area we found that few adult males attend any chapel or church regularly. Slightly more adult females attend regularly. Most children have never attended a church or chapel regulary. Very few children have been christened. Most chapels and churches hold a Sunday School for children and run an annual outing.
